products.title: Doppio Rosso Primitivo Merlot 2020 - Grande Vitae
products.description: The semi-dry Doppio Rosso Primitivo Merlot from the house of Grande Vitae shimmers with a bright purple red in the glass. In the glass, this red wine from Grande Vitae reveals aromas of black cherries, plums, blueberries, morello cherries and blackberries, complemented by other fruity nuances. The Grande Vitae Doppio Rosso Primitivo Merlot shows us an incredibly fruity taste on the palate, which is not without reason due to its residual sweet profile. On the palate, the texture of this balanced red wine presents itself wonderfully silky and velvety. Due to its concise fruit acid, the Doppio Rosso Primitivo Merlot shows itself exceptionally fresh and lively on the palate. In the finish, this youthful red wine from the wine-growing region of Apulia finally inspires with considerable length. There are again hints of blueberry and blackberry.

products.title: Merlot Rosato Terre di Chieti IGT 2021 - Tenuta Ulisse
products.description:
The Merlot Rosato from Tenuta Ulisse is the bestseller rosé of the top winery in Abruzzo. It comes with strong raspberry red in the glass and inspires not only the Rosé friend, but every wine lover who likes powerful and expressive wines. First of all, fruity notes of ripe raspberries, cranberries, strawberries and cherries penetrate the nose. The fruit is complemented by floral notes, fine herbal spices and light citric nuances of pink grapefruit, kumquat and bergamot. Flowery notes of hibiscus and bushrose round off the bouquet brilliantly.

The Ulisse Merlot Rosato starts on the palate with an animating, fruity attack. This Italian rosé glides over the tongue with a wonderful grip, juicy and vital acidity. A feast for the senses. No wonder, then, that critic legend Luca Maroni gave this Ulisse wine its highest rating for the second time.
products.slug: Merlot Rosato Terre di Chieti IGT 2021 - Tenuta Ulisse

products.title: Doppio Passo Rosato Puglia IGT 2021 - CVCB
products.description: The Doppio Passo Rosato Puglia IGT by Casa Vinicola Carlo Botter has a dazzling, salmon colour. Its bouquet appears fruity and sweet, but at the same time spicy with an intense and unique aroma of blackberries and redcurrants. On the palate, the Rosato has a good structure, shows a pleasant acidity and is full-bodied. As with his big brother, the grapes for this extraordinary Primitivo Rosato are carefully selected in the most refined handwork. And just like the Doppio Passo "Rosso" the Rosato convinces with a fulminant interplay of sweetness, fruit and elegance! Enjoy the first warmer days of the year with this fruity and spicy Primitivo Rosato! Serve the Doppio Passo Primitivo Rosato with fish dishes, pasta with fine sauces and delicate sausages.
products.slug: Doppio Passo Rosato Puglia IGT 2021 - CVCB

products.title: La vie est belle rosé 2021 - La vie est belle
products.description:
La vie est belle - life can be so beautiful. As light and carefree as this motto this fresh rosé wine is. This cuvée presents itself in the glass in a delicate rose. La vie est belle Rosé caresses the nose with the wonderfully fresh and crisp aromas of citrus and elderflower.

On the palate this wine from France convinces with a great juiciness. The tasty residual sweetness of this wine blends harmoniously with fresh notes and a lively acidity. The lightness of this rosé seduces to the next sip.
products.slug: La vie est belle rosé 2021 - La vie est belle

products.title: Glicine Rosato Terre Siciliane IGT 2020 - Duca di Salaparuta
products.description: The Glicine Rosato Terre Siciliane by Duca di Salaparuta from Sicily offers a brilliant, strong rosé red colour in the wine glass. The Duca di Salaparuta Glicine Rosato Terre Siciliane presents itself wonderfully dry to the wine drinker. This rosé wine is never coarse or meager, as one might expect from a wine in the upper price range. Due to its present fruit acidity, the Glicine Rosato Terre Siciliane reveals itself to be fantastically fresh and lively on the palate.
products.slug: Glicine Rosato Terre Siciliane IGT 2020 - Duca di Salaparuta

products.title: Santa Digna Rosé Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 - Miguel Torres Chile
products.description: The Santa Digna Rosé Cabernet Sauvignon from Miguel Torres Chile delights with an enticing bouquet of juicy ripened plums and fragrant strawberries, accompanied by fresh citrus notes (grapefruit). This pure Cabernet Sauvignon reveals itself in a bright cherry red in the glass. On the palate it is powerful, invigorating with delicate acidity and juicy fruit. In the aftertaste its sensuality and elegance can be heard with the persistent and fruity-aromatic finish.
products.slug: Santa Digna Rosé Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 - Miguel Torres Chile

products.title: Schmetterlinge im Bauch Rosé 2021 - Weingut Kiefer
products.description:
The Schmetterlinge im Bauch Rosé from Weingut Kiefer from the series "Junge Poeten" shines with a wonderful raspberry-pink in the glass. To the eye a dreamlike rosé wine with intensive color reveals itself, the lively and exciting smell after red fruits such as raspberry, strawberry and red currant, supplements by meadow flowers and citric nuances.

On the palate, this German rosé wine is dominated by ripe raspberries and red currants. A delicate tingling sensation, combined with a hearty play of sweetness and acidity, radiates pure joie de vivre and guarantees an uncomplicated and wonderfully fruity drinking pleasure.

After "real" butterflies in the belly, this wine is the next best thing. Of course, the combination of both versions is best.
products.slug: Schmetterlinge im Bauch Rosé 2021 - Weingut Kiefer

products.title: Miraflors Rosé 2020 - Domaine Lafage
products.description:
The Miraflors Rosé from Domaine Lafage from the French wine-growing region Côtes Catalanes in Languedoc is an elegant, light-footed and excellent Rosé wine Cuvee, which is vinified from the grape varieties Mourvedre, Grenache Gris and Grenache Noir.

This wine shines in a bright pink in the glass. Freshness reaches the nose first. Here aromas of strawberries and blackberries, supported by a hint of herbs show up. The berry aromas pamper the senses and whet the appetite for summer. On the palate, the Miraflors Rosé is juicy, spicy, round and soft, as well as lively, thanks to the aromas of berries and a fresh acidity. The finish of this wonderful rosé from southern France is lively and stimulating.

products.title: Cinsault Rosé 1,0 l 2020 - Maison Lavelle
products.description:
The Cinsault Rosé by Maison Lavelle reveals itself in the glass in a rich rosé and enchants with its inviting and fruity bouquet.

This pure Cinsault from the Pays d'Oc is a refreshing and elegant rosé wine that delights with its harmonic impression and its perfectly balanced sweetness on the palate.

products.title: Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 - Dark Horse
products.description:
The Cabernet Sauvignon from Dark Horse shines in the glass ruby red and unfolds a multi-layered bouquet with the aromas of black cherries and blackberries. These fruit notes are accompanied by coffee and espresso, as well as a touch of vanilla.

This Californian red wine made from Cabernet Sauvignon, Petite Sirah and Zinfandel grapes has an impressive character on the palate with firm tannins and a wonderfully velvety texture.

products.title: Elysium 0,375 l 2018 - Quady Winery
products.description:
Elysium from Quady Winery is an excellent red dessert wine from California.

The notes of rose petals are very clear on this expressive bouquet. Also on the palate the rose aroma is in the foreground, which is accompanied by blackberry, blackcurrant and some raspberry. The body is perfectly balanced and harmonizes wonderfully with the pleasant fruit acidity.

products.title: Pinot Noir Russian River Valley 2018 - Paul Hobbs
products.description:
The powerful Pinot Noir Russian River Valley by Paul Hobbs shimmers into the glass with dense bright red. On the nose, this Paul Hobbs red wine reveals all kinds of lavender, jasmine, lilies, violets and blackcurrants. As if this wasn't already impressive, the ageing in small wooden barrels adds further aromas such as oriental spices, gingerbread spice and cocoa bean.

On the palate, the texture of this powerful red wine is wonderfully silky. Due to the moderate fruit acidity, the Pinot Noir Russian River Valley flatters with a velvety mouthfeel without lacking freshness. In the finish, this very storable red wine from the California wine growing region finally inspires with considerable length. There are again hints of blueberry and mulberry.
products.slug: Pinot Noir Russian River Valley 2018 - Paul Hobbs

products.title: Zinfandel Heritage Vines Sonoma County 2019 - Rancho Zabaco
products.description:
Der Zinfandel Heritage Vines Sonoma County von Rancho Zabaco präsentiert sich im Glas in einem dunklen Rubinrot und entfaltet die herrlichen Aromen von Brombeermarmelade, Kirschen und einem Hauch Pfeffer.

Karamellisierte und rauchige Noten prägen den Geschmack dieser Rotweincuvée. Reiche Fruchtaromen unterstreichen das zugängliche Mundgefühl.
products.slug: Zinfandel Heritage Vines Sonoma County 2019 - Rancho Zabaco

products.title: Belstar Prosecco Brut DOC - Bisol
products.description: The Belstar Prosecco Brut from the wine-growing region of Veneto presents itself in the glass in a brilliantly shimmering platinum yellow. The perlage of this Prosecco Spumante presents itself in the glass vital and long lasting. In the glass, this Prosecco Spumante by Bisol presents aromas of apricots, apples, vineyard peach, cherry blossoms and pears, complemented by other fruity nuances. This dry Prosecco Spumante from Bisol is perfect for wine connoisseurs who can't drink their wine dry enough. The Belstar Prosecco Brut already comes quite close to this, as it was pressed with just 11 grams of residual sugar. On the tongue, this light-footed sparkling wine is characterized by an incredibly crisp texture. Due to its concise fruit acid, the Belstar Prosecco Brut presents itself impressively fresh and lively on the palate. The finale of this sparkling wine from the wine-growing region Veneto, more precisely from Prosecco DOC, finally convinces with a good reverberation

products.title: Desiderio N°1 Rosé Spumante Brut - Desiderio N°1
products.description: With the Desiderio N°1 Rosé Spumante Brut, a first-class spumante comes into the glass. It reveals a wonderfully brilliant, golden yellow colour. The perlage of this spumante is vital and long-lasting in the glass. Rosé Spumante Brut by Desiderio N°1 is just the right thing for all wine connoisseurs who like as little sweetness as possible in their wine. At the same time, however, it never appears meager or brittle, as one can naturally expect from a wine. On the palate, the texture of this light-footed Spumante is wonderfully light. Due to its lively fruit acidity, the Desiderio N°1 Rosé Spumante Brut reveals itself to be fantastically fresh and lively on the palate. The final of this Spumante from the wine-growing region Veneto captivates finally with good reverberation.

products.title: Hochgewächs Chardonnay - Kessler
products.description:
The sparkling wine Hochgewächs Chardonnay by Kessler from Württemberg reveals a brilliant, golden yellow color in the tilted glass. In the center this sparkling wine shows a vivid color. This varietal German wine flatters in the glass with wonderfully expressive notes of plums, morello cherries, plums and black cherries. In addition, there are hints of forest soil and sun-warm rock.

On the tongue, this light-footed sparkling wine is characterized by an incredibly crisp texture. In the finish this storable sparkling wine from the wine-growing region of Württemberg finally inspires with its good length. There are again hints of morello cherry and plum.

products.title: il Fresco Prosecco Spumante Brut DOC 0,375 l - Villa Sandi
products.description: Villa Sandi's il Fresco Prosecco Spumante DOC Brut has been voted Prosecco of the Year several times (Weinwirtschaft - Meininger Verlag). It is and remains a truly outstanding, crisp and fruity recommendation! "Great grape cinema" writes the GQ magazine. The Prosecco il freso is the right prosecco for the next family celebration, the correct aperitif for an appropriate wine tasting or simply a nice meal. One of VINELLO's best sellers of Prosecco.

products.title: Etichetta Nera Spumante Millesimato Extra Dry - Sacchetto
products.description:
The Spumante Etichetta Nera Millesimato Extra Dry by Sacchetto reveals itself in an elegant golden yellow in the glass. The delicious aromas of tropical fruits, citrus fruits and floral hints unfold.

This spumante delights the palate with its refreshing acidity and its dry and soft impression. This sparkling wine is the perfect companion for a carefree enjoyment.

products.title: Jeio Prosecco Superiore Brut DOCG - Bisol
products.description:
Bisol's Jeio Prosecco Superiore Brut from the Italian DOCG Valdobbiadene wine region in Veneto is an elegant, tasty and fruity sparkling wine. The sparkling wines of the Jeio line are dedicated to Desiderio "Jeio" Bisol.

In the glass this wine shines in a brilliant straw yellow with straw yellow highlights. The perlage dances vividly to the surface with fine strings of pearls. Wonderful aromas of yellow fruits - especially juicy apple, pear and ripe apricot - reveal the fruity bouquet. On the palate this Italian sparkling wine convinces with its soft and elegant personality. The aromas of the nose are also reflected and underline the distinct fruitiness of this Prosecco.

products.title: Cartizze Prosecco Superiore DOCG - Bisol
products.description:
The Cartizze Prosecco Superiore from Bisol from the Italian DOCG Valdobbiadene wine region in Veneto is a lively, animating and pleasantly fruity sparkling wine.

In a clear straw yellow with light golden highlights presents itself in the glass. The lively perlage rises to the surface in persistent pearl strings. The nose is spoiled by a fruity aroma of juicy apples as well as pears and ripe peaches. Floral hints of wild flowers are also present. On the palate this elegant Prosecco convinces with a wonderfully balanced interplay of filigree sweetness, well-integrated acidity and intensive fruitiness.
